description: Design, implementation & presentation of a research project, approved by the Head of School & relevant to the course, with emphasis on defining the research issue, establishing methodology, undertaking appropriate analysis of data & drawing defensible conclusions. Students completing the course in one semester must gain permission to enrol in FOOD7617 from both the Program and Courses Coordinators.  Students completing the course in two semesters must enrol in FOOD7618 if commencing in sem 1 or FOOD7619 if commencing in sem 2.
